long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
List of features:
- Seeking 3 seconds backward and forward with arrow keys
- Play shorts in a separate persistent window (PiP), so that you can do something else on your device while also enjoying YouTube shorts
- Autoplay next when in PiP mode.

The PiP mode is only functional to those who have their Chrome version at least 116.

https://caniuse.com/mdn-api_documentpictureinpicture_requestwindow
